org.crosswire.common.util
类 Languages

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.common.util.Languages

public class Languages
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class that converts ISO-639 codes or locales to their "friendly" language name.

作者：
DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]

DEFAULT_LANG_CODE

public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_LANG_CODE
另请参见：
常量字段值
方法详细信息

isValidLanguage

public static boolean isValidLanguage(java.lang.String iso639Code)
Determine whether the language code is valid. The code is valid if it is null or empty. The code is valid if it is in iso639.properties. If a locale is used for the iso639Code, it will use the part before the '_'. Thus, this code does not support dialects, except as found in the iso639.

参数：
iso639Code -
返回：
true if the language is valid.

getLanguageName

public static java.lang.String getLanguageName(java.lang.String iso639Code)
Get the language name from the language code. If the code is null or empty then it is considered to be DEFAULT_LANG_CODE (that is, English). If it starts with x- or is too long then it will return unknown. If the code's name cannot be found, it will return the code. If a locale is used for the iso639Code, it will use the part before the '_'. Thus, this code does not support dialects, except as found in the iso639.

参数：
iso639Code -
返回：
the name of the language

getLanguageCode

public static java.lang.String getLanguageCode(java.lang.String input)
Get the language code from the input. If the code is null or empty then it is considered to be DEFAULT_LANG_CODE (that is, English). If a locale is used for the iso639Code, it will use the part before the '_'. Thus, this code does not support dialects, except as found in the iso639. If it is known to be unknown then return unknown. Otherwise, return the 2 or 3 letter code. Note: it might not be valid.

参数：
input -
返回：
the code for the language
